issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is not completely described.
resolution.name: Incomplete

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: ActiveMQ fails to restart when there is a zero broker sequence ID
fields.environment:
ActiveMQ v5.5.0 on Sun's JDK 1.6.0_23
OS: Windows XP 2002 with sp3
Database:  Oracle10g using JDBC driver ojdbc6_g.jar v11.2.0.2

comments.body: We could use a test case, or some other info on how your broker got into this situation.
why the msg is not null but populated with zeros?
Downgraded to major - we don't generally see this problem and require more information to understand how the broker got into this state
We need more information to understand how this could happen.
